Address.value: 233 SPRING STREET, NEW YORK, New York, 10013, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: DoubleVerify Holdings Inc is a digital media measurement and analytics software platform. The Authentic Ad ensures that a digital ad was delivered in a brand-safe setting, completely viewable, by a real individual, and in the expected geography, is one of its solutions. It generates revenues from its advertisement customers by charging a Measured Transaction Fee on the volume of Media Transactions Measured on the software platform.
